title: Potted Fig Tree Care: Water Sunlight Fertilizer Pot Size & MORE

tasks.task: MAINTASK: Growing fig trees in containers
subtasks: Choosing the right pot size (at least three gallons)
Managing watering using drip irrigation (about half a gallon per 5 gallons daily)
Using well-draining soil (e.g., ProMix) and adding mulch
Ensuring adequate sunlight and warmth, especially in containers.
